Owlhawk jumps back sending the beam at Inferno
(remember it won't seem to effect him at all if it
hits, he won't feel any pain for anywhere from days to
weeks depending on how strong he is).  He screams when
he falls on his wing, but then manages to get back up
and take aim at Megatron.

--- catmastero <catmastero@...> wrote:
> Inferno fired an energy blast at Owlhawk's cannon to
> try and mess up 
> his aim "You shall never harm the queen!" he
> exclaimed angerly.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...>
> wrote:
> > OOC: Where's know where?  Is that a town for nerds
> or
> > something?  Is it close to the Predicon base then?
> 
> > Lol.
> > 
> > BIC:  Sunhawk dodges taking one plasma blast to
> one of
> > his Owl wings.  He lands and transforms facing
> > Megatron.  His chest opens, and a canon comes out.
> > 
> > Owlhawk:  THIS Megatron is the Vok Destroyer. 
> Once
> > you get hit by it you will be infected  with a
> > virtually incurable virus causing your spark to
> slowly
> > break down over several months as you experience
> > increasingly common spasms of pain.
> > 
> > He doesn't move or show any sign he's in pain from
> his
> > wing as he says this, although the sparks comming
> from
> > his wing make it very clear.  He fires the Vok
> > Destroyer at Megatron.
> > 
> > OOC: Hey rAuq do me a favor and start a poll to
> see if
> > "I am your angel of death" would have been a
> better
> > intruduction, although Megatron as I recall had a
> > tendancy to talk during battle, so he wouldn't
> shoot
> > until the speach was over anyway (unless you
> intend to
> > change him) regardless of how long it took.
> > 
> >
